forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 67F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 52F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Sunny skies in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming sunny by afternoon. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
